_id.description: must be an objectId and is required

name.description: name of the meal and is required

mealType.description: type of the meal (e.g., Breakfast, Lunch, etc.) and is required

name.description: name of the ingredient and is required

quantity.description: quantity of the ingredient, can be nil, e.g., 'to taste'

ingredients.description: ingredients used in the meal and is required

method.description: cooking instructions for the meal and is required

prepTime.description: preparation time in minutes and is required

cookingTime.description: cooking time in minutes and is required

energy.description: energy in KJ or Cal and is required

protein.description: protein in grams and is required

fat.description: fat in grams and is required

saturatedFat.description: saturated fat in grams and is required

carbohydrates.description: carbohydrates in grams and is required

sugars.description: sugars in grams and is required

fiber.description: fiber in grams and is required

nutritionalInfo.description: nutritional breakdown of the meal per serving and is required

nutritionalLabels.description: nutritional labels for the meal, e.g., GF, DF, etc.

numberOfServings.description: number of servings provided by the meal and is required
